text: So Ananias went and entered the house, and placing his hands on him he said, “BrotherThat was a nice touch. At that moment it no doubt meant a lot to Saul to be called ‘brother’. Saul, the Lord,Some 10% of the Greek manuscripts add ‘Jesus’, to be followed by most versions. who appeared to you on the road by which you came, has sent me so that you may recover your sight and be filled by Holy Spirit.”
